mapper.select: SELECT bookings.id AS id, code AS code, movie.title_kor AS titleKor, bookings.hall AS hall, TO_CHAR(movie.op_time,'YYYY_MM_DD') AS opTime, bookings.seat_show AS seatShow, bookings.seat_hidden AS seatHidden FROM bookings inner join movie USING(code) WHERE bookings.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings ( id, code, seat_show, seat_hidden ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{seatShow}, #{seatHidden} )
mapper.delete: DELETE bookings WHERE id = #{id} AND seat_hidden = #{seatHidden}
